section: The business name of the Venture will be BM&V2GO, however the partnership name will be Vaccines2Go.
explanation: The document states that the business name of the venture will be 'BM&V2GO', but then goes on to state that the partnership name will be 'Vaccines2Go'. This creates confusion as to what the name of the company actually is. There can only be one name for the joint venture.

section: *HTML code, build, deploy and maintain all technical aspect requirements including a database for medical dispatch personal & product service as needed, including activity information, data storage and backup. provided by three qualified assigned Borrowmoney.com, inc. employees/personal
explanation: The asterisk at the beginning of the text indicates that there could be more information related to this, but this information is not found anywhere else in the document. This leads to ambiguity.

section: Each Member will be responsible for its respective duties as follows: Page 3 of 13 Member Duties Description BorrowMoney.com, inc *HTML code, build, deploy and maintain all technical aspect requirements including a database for medical dispatch personal & product service as needed, including activity information, data storage and backup. provided by three qualified assigned Borrowmoney.com, inc. employees/personal JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue From Awarded Contract, In Addition to The Total Contributions.
explanation: The structure of the text on page 3 is a bit hard to read. It is unclear what the exact duties are and the wording is a bit confusing. This section could have been created to be easier to understand.

section: Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"): Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc 1, 500 square feet of Leased/rent office Space Includingspecified Description of duty* $3,500.00 USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go is supposed to contribute $60,000 from Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. But the actual value that they are contributing is $3,500,000.00 USD. It is unclear if the $3,500,000 is included in the initial agreement, or it is in addition to the $60,000.

section: Any management vote required will be determined such that each Manager receives one vote carrying equal weight, unless otherwise decided by BorrowMoney.com inc.
explanation: This section states that BorrowMoney.com inc. can decide that a Manager's vote does not carry equal weight. This is an issue because it gives them more power, which is not fair to the other party.
